about_the_game:
Escape Simulator: Among Us DLC is a free DLC for Escape Simulator, made by Pine Studio in collaboration with Innersloth, based on Innersloth’s beloved hit game Among Us.

THE MINI SKELD


From navigation, all the way to the cargo bay and beyond, explore every nook and cranny of a mysteriously abandoned spaceship: The Mini Skeld.

FIND YOUR WAY OUT


Unlike in Among Us, the primary goal in Escape Simulator and The Mini Skeld is for everyone to work together, solve puzzles and escape! There are no impostors… But, if you want to become one and hinder the progress of your friends, who are we to stop you?

PERPLEXING PUZZLES


Solve a variety of intricate new puzzles and devices, in this content packed escape-room!

DRESS FOR SPACE!

Attention crewmates! Working in space requires the correct gear. Put on your brand new space suit and start exploring!

FEATURE LIST

  • Brand new Among Us inspired escape-room packed with original puzzles.
  • Play solo or online with friends. The DLC plays best with 1-4 players, but it’s playable with up to 10!
  • New character hats inspired by Among Us crewmates.
  • Checkpoint system so you can gradually progress through the ship.
  • Try to escape in under 60 minutes and win the trophy!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux <3
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable GPU
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some community-made rooms are quite big and performance heavy and need more RAM memory and better GPU.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 19 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU
  • Additional Notes: The game works great on the new M1 Mac. Some community-made rooms are quite big and performance heavy and need more RAM memory and better GPU.
